messages.subject: Samurai 'Wish List'
messages.msgSnippet: In the interest of future updates and ideas for the Samurai Archives, if you can think of anything you d like to see on the page, please let us know. If you
messages.messageBody:
In the interest of future updates and ideas for the Samurai Archives,
if you can think of anything you'd like to see on the page, please
let us know. If you feel there is anything painfully absent, or have
an interesting idea, respond to this post!

CEW & FWS
